website_summaries.verdict: Even semicompetitive PC gamers can get away with a less expensive mouse, but for the most dedicated, the Razer Mamba provides unmatched precision whether it's connected directly to your PC or set free in wireless mode. If Razer fixed a few design and features issues, we'd feel better about the price.
pros: high polling rate ensures seamless wireless connection, even at high resolutions
onboard memory lets you take your profiles and macros on the road
cons: clunky USB cable a hassle to plug into the mouse

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a little over a year.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately after about a year and a half the mouse stopped working suddenly and for no apparent reason. Plugged in wired it is recognized as unknown device that is not working properly. Wirelessly it isn't even recognized. The included software wont see the device and closes down instantly. I have uninstalled and reinstalled, updated the firmware and tried every manor of configuration with no success. I tested the battery and it seems fine. Done everything I could think of but this is a no go. I am contacting Razer for warranty service and seeing what they can do, be cautious.
